name: Muscle Car Rally
description:
Racing your dream muscle sport cars on highland
Driving your dream sports cars around nice environment
This is very basic of racing , rally muscle sports cars game
Racing , rally your dream car around nice highland environment is so great.
This is very basic of racing , rally car game
Features:
- Amazing graphics of sport cars , highland environment
- Simple controls to control and drive your dream car on nice environment of highland
- Gas, break buttons to race your racing , rally car
- Swing your device to control your car steer
- Automatic gear of your racing , rally car
- Camera button to change your view of racing , rally car
